author: Victor Ferreira
title: Economists predicting U.S. jobless claims may top 5.5 million to set new weekly record
description: Unemployment rate could hit 15 or even 20 per cent going through April
content:
Economists across North America are predicting that the United States will set another record for unemployment claims when figures for the week that ended on March 28 are released on Thursday morning.
According to a Reuters survey, economists expect a median… [+4034 chars]
